name: The Murder of John Smith
description:
In <The Murder of John Smith>. You will play as an Internal Affairs (IA) agent and your mission is to find the real killer of Detective John Smith at this reconstructed crime scene.

(All asset are free and not for commercial use)

Please let me know in the comments if you have any other feedback or you find bug in game!

Thank you! :)

Update: ① 2023.1.15 Fixed missing box collider of  scene buildings
